channel.title: ScanX – Corporate Actions
channel.description: Auto-generated feed for ScanX Corporate Actions

item.title: iStreet Network Limited Board Approves Share Consolidation from ₹4 to ₹10 Face Value
item.description: Top News iStreet Network Limited Board Approves Share Consolidation from ₹4 to ₹10 Face Value 2 hours ago iStreet Network Limited's Board of Directors approved a share consolidation plan on December 11, 2025, converting equity shares from ₹4.00 to ₹10.00 face value at a 5:2 ratio. The consolidation aims to align with industry standards, enhance capital structure stability, and improve institutional readiness. Subject to regulatory and shareholder approvals, the process is expected to complete within 3 months while maintaining the same authorized capital of ₹80.00 crores.

item.title: Kotak Mahindra Bank Limited Schedules Investor Meeting at Citi India Financials Tour 2025
item.description: Kotak Mahindra Bank Limited Schedules Investor Meeting at Citi India Financials Tour 2025 1 hour ago Kotak Mahindra Bank Limited has scheduled an investor meeting for December 16, 2025, at the Citi India Financials Tour 2025 in Mumbai. The bank notified stock exchanges about this engagement with analysts and institutional investors as required under SEBI Regulation 30. The disclosure ensures transparency in investor relations activities and compliance with listing obligations.

item.title: Nifty and Sensex Close in Green: Market Wrap for December 11, 2025
item.description: Nifty and Sensex Close in Green: Market Wrap for December 11, 2025 8 hours ago Indian stock markets ended positively on December 11, with Nifty 50 up 0.55% at 25,898.55 and Sensex rising 0.51% to 84,818.13. Market breadth was bullish with 2,597 advancing stocks out of 4,548 traded. Key buzzing stocks included InterGlobe Aviation, Biocon Biologics, and Kaynes Technology, driven by company-specific news and analyst actions.

item.title: Indrayani Biotech Reports Strong Q2FY26 Performance with Revenue Growth and Board Restructuring
item.description: Indrayani Biotech Reports Strong Q2FY26 Performance with Revenue Growth and Board Restructuring 4 hours ago Indrayani Biotech Limited announced Q2FY26 results showing consolidated revenue growth of 16.66% to ₹3,594.85 lakhs, while net profit decreased 25.04% to ₹91.21 lakhs. The company underwent significant governance changes with director resignation and committee reconstitution, and resolved regulatory compliance issues by paying BSE fines of ₹16,520.
